## Data Pre-Processing

```{r}
data = read.csv("INPUT_SQL_Text_Data_Astronomy_and_Astrophysics.csv")
library('stm')

processed <- textProcessor(data$title, metadata = data) 
out <- prepDocuments(processed$documents, processed$vocab, processed$meta)
docs <- out$documents
vocab <- out$vocab
meta <- out$meta


```
